body.p: Paragraphs 110–116 set out the requirements for reversing an impairment loss recognised for an asset or a cash‑generating unit in prior periods. These requirements use the term ‘an asset’ but apply equally to an individual asset or a cash‑generating unit. Additional requirements for an individual asset are set out in paragraphs 117–121, for a cash‑generating unit in paragraphs 122 and 123 and for goodwill in paragraphs 124 and 125.
